content: Jupiter is an Indian neobank app (Amica Financial Technologies Pvt Ltd) founded in 2019 that lets users pay, track, save, invest and borrow—all in one place; it now serves 30 lakh+ customers.
title: Company Snapshot

content: Jupiter’s aim is to deliver a bank-like experience with the simplicity and speed of an internet company, helping digitally native Indians make sense of their money.
title: Vision & Mission

content: Jupiter was founded by Jitendra Gupta, a serial fintech entrepreneur (ex-Citrus Pay, ex-PayU MD).
title: Founder & CEO

content: The Money tab on Jupiter helps you track your income, spending, top spending categories, upcoming bills, and even offers smart insights into your money habits. It’s a one-stop hub to see where your money goes and manage it effectively.
title: Features in the Money Tab

content: Jupiter auto-categorizes your expenses using smart tags like groceries, shopping, food, etc. These tags help you understand where your money goes and give you insights to manage your spending more wisely.
title: Spending Categories & Smart Tags

content: Account Aggregator (AA) is a secure RBI-regulated framework that lets you link all your bank accounts to view balances and transactions in one place. You have full control over what data is shared and for how long. Jupiter uses licensed AAs like Finvu to fetch your data—with your consent only.
title: What is Account Aggregator?

content: Yes! It’s completely safe. Jupiter only accesses your financial data through RBI-licensed Account Aggregators like Finvu, and only with your permission. You stay in control of what you share. Your privacy and security are top priorities.
title: Is it safe to link accounts with Jupiter?

content: Yes, you can set monthly budgets in the Money tab to manage your expenses better. Jupiter notifies you when you're nearing your budget limits, helping you stay in control of your spending across categories like food, shopping, and travel.
title: Setting Budgets in Jupiter

content: Your Net Worth in Jupiter is calculated as what you own minus what you owe. It includes your linked bank balances, credit card dues, loans, and investments. When you link accounts via Account Aggregator, Jupiter gives you a complete, real-time view of your finances.
title: Understanding Net Worth in Jupiter
